tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE media_content (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  release_date DATE NOT NULL,
  duration INTERVAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE media_content (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    release_date DATE NOT NULL,
    duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE media_statistics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    media_id INT NOT NULL,
    views INT DEFAULT 0,
    likes INT DEFAULT 0,
    shares INT DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE media_content (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  genre VARCHAR(50),
  release_date DATE,
  duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE media_actors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  actor_name VARCHAR(100),
  media_id INT REFERENCES media_content(id)
)

CREATE TABLE media_reviews (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating FLOAT,
  media_id INT REFERENCES media_content(id)
)
